name: The Dark Tower (protodrew)
description:
The dark tower is a small little top-down stealth game where you are a lowly minion trying to sneak through a prison to free your overlord and grab a friend to help you along the way.

Controls

=====

movement = WASD or Left Stick

diffuse trap/confirm in menu = Enter/Space or Xbox A/Dualshock Cross

restart = R or Xbox X / Dualshock Square

switch player = E or Xbox Y/Dualshock Triangle

made by:

drew aka protodrew

https://cybre.space/@protodrew

&

skye pritchard

https://instagram.com/saekonungar

featuring music from Trevor Lentz

  • in-game music 
  • level music
